  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      public UserService(UserRepository repository, UserMetaRepository doctorDtoRepository, UserMappingService mapping, org.springframework.security.crypto.bcrypt.BCryptPasswordEncoder encoder, TokenService tokenService)
      Constructs a new UserService with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      repository - the UserRepository to interact with the database
      doctorDtoRepository - the UserMetaRepository to fetch doctor data
      mapping - the UserMappingService for mapping user data
      encoder - the BCryptPasswordEncoder for password encoding
      tokenService - the TokenService for generating authentication tokens

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public TokenResponseDto registerUser(RegistrationForm form)
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      form - the RegistrationForm containing user details
      Returns:
      a TokenResponseDto containing access and refresh tokens
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyExistsException - if a user with the same username already exists

    • getDoctorById

      public UserDto getDoctorById(int doctorId)
      Retrieves the UserDto representation of a doctor by their ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor to retrieve
      Returns:
      the UserDto representing the doctor
      Throws:
      DoctorNotFoundException - if the doctor with the specified ID is not found or does not have the 'ROLE_DOCTOR' role

    • getPatientByName

      public List<UserDto> getPatientByName(String partName)
      Retrieves a list of UserDto representations of patients by their partial name.
      Parameters:
      partName - the partial name of the patients to search for
      Returns:
      the list of UserDto representing the patients

    • getUserByRole

      public List<UserDto> getUserByRole(String role)
      Retrieves a list of UserDto with the specified role.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to filter users by
      Returns:
      a list of user DTOs with the specified role

    • getUserById

      public UserDto getUserById(int id)
      Retrieves the UserDto representation of a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      the UserDto representing the user
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if the user with the specified ID is not found

    • loadUserByUsername

      public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(String username) throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
      Loads the UserDetails for the specified username. Overridden method of UserDetailsService, is using Spring security
      Specified by:
      loadUserByUsername in interface org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to load
      Returns:
      the UserDetails representing the user
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if the user with the specified username is not found
